entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
